content: I totally see it’s benefit to a project, especially with the increase in e-commerce and apps. Understanding what users like and dislike about your product is crucial, of course it is. However I just feel we are blurring the lines of what user experience is and what it needs to be. It feels like it has been put on a pedestal and personally a majority of the time I don’t see anything that is being done that is any different to what good designers do daily on every project.
